node.title: Diversity, Equity & Inclusion
node.responsivehero: {"918482":{"type":86,"fields":{"heroTitle":null,"heroText":null,"heroImage":[],"heroBackgroundColor":"#ffffff","heroOverlayAlpha":0,"heroOverlayColor":null}}}
node.heroimagegrid:
{"918486":{"type":114,"fields":{"heroTitle":"Diversity Is In Our DNA","heroGridImages":[924836,924835,919771,924831,924837,924833,924832],"heroBackgroundImage":[916746],"heroCtaLink":"{\"linkedId\":null,\"linkedSiteId\":null,\"linkedTitle\":null,\"linkedUrl\":null,\"payload\":null,\"type\":\"entry\"}","subheroTitle":"We Embrace and Respect Authenticity","subheroParagraph":"

Diversity, equity and inclusion (DEI). At Applause, we understand their combined power. We value diversity in all its forms: age, color, disability, ethnicity, family\/marital status, gender identity\/expression, language, national origin, physical\/mental ability, race, religion, sexual orientation, socio-economic status, veteran status and more.<\/p>\n

Each day, we strive to both remove the hurdles to equity and to enable opportunities for all employees. As a minority owned business<\/a>, DEI is in our DNA, and our global community adds tremendously to that mix. We also prioritize charitable contributions to organizations that support underrepresented groups, such as dream.org<\/a>, GLAAD<\/a> and United Way<\/a>.<\/p>"}}}

in Equity Every Day","sectionSubtitle":null,"paragraphText":"

Equity doesn’t just happen overnight, nor is it a one-time event. Our ongoing commitment is built on the foundation of our professional development curriculum and approach to leadership training. We provide all the tools needed — everything from unconscious bias training to methods for offsetting legacy disadvantages and more. It’s also core to the way we interact as teammates on a daily basis, and the expectations we set for each other.<\/p>","sectionImage":[919111],"sectionCta":"{\"linkedId\":null,\"linkedSiteId\":null,\"linkedTitle\":null,\"linkedUrl\":null,\"payload\":null,\"type\":\"\"}","sectionLayout":"textRight","sectionCtaColor":"is-secondary","sectionCtaAlignment":"right","hideThisOnMobile":false}},"919627":{"type":"prefabSection","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":1,"fields":{"sectionBackground":"white","sectionBackgroundColors":null,"cssClasses":"contract-future","tabName":null}},"919628":{"type":"prefab_text_w_image","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":2,"fields":{"sectionTitle":"A Contract for a Sustainable Future","sectionSubtitle":null,"paragraphText":"

Applause’s sustainability practices reflect our core belief that doing the right thing is also good for our customers and the world.<\/p>\n

Our CEO, Chris Malone, signed the Vista CEO pledge<\/a>, which commits us to measure greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions annually and reduce them by 50% by 2030 and reach net zero by 2050. Each year, we set GHG reduction targets and offset goals. We also focus on energy and waste management as well as product innovation to support positive environmental outcomes.<\/p>\n

In addition, because we have built a successful hybrid office-remote work environment, we reduce energy use around the world.<\/p>","sectionImage":[919338],"sectionCta":"{\"linkedId\":null,\"linkedSiteId\":null,\"linkedTitle\":null,\"linkedUrl\":null,\"payload\":null,\"type\":\"\"}","sectionLayout":"textLeft","sectionCtaColor":"is-secondary","sectionCtaAlignment":"left","hideThisOnMobile":false}},"919629":{"type":"customSection","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":1,"fields":{"sectionLayout":"textTop","sectionBackground":"white","sectionBackgroundColors":null,"cssClasses":"dei-footer","tabName":null}},"919630":{"type":"headings","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":2,"fields":{"sectionTitle":"Check Out Life at Applause","sectionSubtitle":null}},"919631":{"type":"paragraphText","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":2,"fields":{"paragraphText":"

It’s one thing to talk about diversity and it’s another to see it in action. Our employees embody it in every way, and they regularly express their individuality via our Slack channels, in company meetings and through their work with customers.<\/p>"}},"919632":{"type":"cta","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":2,"fields":{"sectionCta":"{\"linkedId\":916744,\"linkedSiteId\":null,\"linkedTitle\":null,\"linkedUrl\":null,\"payload\":\"{\\\"customText\\\":\\\"Explore Our Culture\\\"}\",\"type\":\"entry\"}","sectionCtaColor":"is-secondary","sectionCtaAlignment":"center"}}}

node.heroleftsidetext:
{"917352":{"type":109,"fields":{"heroTitle":"Release Faster, With Confidence","heroText":"

We help brands do it every day. How? By testing with real people in the real world. As crowdtesting pioneers, we connect the world’s greatest enterprises with the world’s largest testing community. So brands can build better, release with confidence and deliver digital experiences customers love.
<\/p>","heroImage":[917258],"heroCtaLink":"{\"linkedUrl\":\"3vs2n2jtzu\",\"linkedId\":null,\"linkedSiteId\":null,\"linkedTitle\":null,\"payload\":\"{\\\"customText\\\":\\\"Watch Our Overview\\\"}\",\"type\":\"custom\"}"}}}

{"917356":{"type":"prefabSection","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":1,"fields":{"sectionBackground":"white","sectionBackgroundColors":null,"cssClasses":"release-partner","tabName":null}},"917357":{"type":"prefab_text_w_image","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":2,"fields":{"sectionTitle":"A Release Partner With an Unparalleled Approach to Digital Quality","sectionSubtitle":"It's a bold statement that we proudly own","paragraphText":"

Why are we so different? Our enterprise-grade platform, our global uTest community, our shared values. Applause’s disruptive approach to testing and quality creates unparalleled scale and flexibility for our customers. How? First, we’ve built the world’s largest testing community. Over 1.7M digital experts that can match any testing demographic, configuration or experience required. This global community works hand-in-hand with the Applause team, delivering meaningful, actionable business insight to our customers daily. Unlike traditional testing companies and models (including lab-based and offshoring), we help development teams build and release better software with speed, scale and flexibility.

Supported by the broad resources of Vista Equity Partners, our vision is to be the release partner for all aspects of digital quality.

","sectionImage":[917301],"sectionCta":"{"linkedId":null,"linkedSiteId":null,"linkedTitle":null,"linkedUrl":null,"payload":null,"type":""}","sectionLayout":"textLeft","sectionCtaColor":"is-primary","sectionCtaAlignment":"center","hideThisOnMobile":false}},"917358":{"type":"customSection","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":1,"fields":{"sectionLayout":"textTop","sectionBackground":"custom","sectionBackgroundColors":null,"cssClasses":"applause-timeline card-slider tw-bg-blue-50","tabName":null}},"917359":{"type":"headings","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":2,"fields":{"sectionTitle":"Born Out of Disruption","sectionSubtitle":null}},"930302":{"type":"paragraphText","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":2,"fields":{"paragraphText":"

node.title: Enterprise-Grade Testing Platform
node.responsivehero:
{"846746":{"type":86,"fields":{"heroTitle":"An Enterprise-Grade Testing Platform","heroText":"

The Applause platform was built from the start for speed, scale and flexibility.<\/p>","heroImage":[390829],"heroBackgroundColor":"#ffffff","heroOverlayAlpha":0,"heroOverlayColor":null}}}
node.pagesectionblocksnew:
{"846747":{"type":"customSection","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":1,"fields":{"sectionLayout":"textTop","sectionBackground":"white","sectionBackgroundColors":null,"cssClasses":null,"tabName":null}},"846748":{"type":"headings","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":2,"fields":{"sectionTitle":"Designed With Agile in Mind","sectionSubtitle":"Built to align with the rapid cadence of CI\/CD, and to interoperate with all standard software."}},"846749":{"type":"paragraphText","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":2,"fields":{"paragraphText":"

We enable the testing and digital quality process with the Applause platform, which was built from the start for speed, scale, security and enterprise-class performance. Our platform is open, interoperable and integrates with all standard development tools, environments and systems – including APIs, bug tracking and bug fix verification systems. The Applause platform was designed to align with the rapid cadence of CI\/CD, and to dovetail seamlessly into your existing pipeline and workflow. And our Applause Quality Score (AQS) helps you track and improve quality over time, by evaluating your release readiness build over build.<\/p>\n

Our platform also drives the Community processes of tester engagement and payments, and is the foundation on which we deliver a slew of products and features that brands can deploy as their needs fit. From full stack automation testing, to test case management, to supporting specialized testing teams, the Applause platform delivers the level of enterprise scale and flexibility brands depend on.<\/p>"}},"846750":{"type":"prefabSection","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":1,"fields":{"sectionBackground":"gray","sectionBackgroundColors":null,"cssClasses":null,"tabName":null}},"846751":{"type":"prefab_text_w_image","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":2,"fields":{"sectionTitle":"An Extension of Your Team","sectionSubtitle":"Integrates seamlessly into existing systems, with no overhead.","paragraphText":"

Applause becomes a dynamic extension of your development team, integrating seamlessly into existing systems and processes, without adding complexity or overhead. We become intimately familiar with your existing workflow – developing deep, detailed knowledge of roadmaps, release cadences, sprints and apps, as well as the critically important factors that impact the success of your apps and other digital assets. <\/p>\n

We actively improve your release velocity – bringing to bear our years of experience in solving the most challenging testing and digital quality problems – and can show you what is possible in improving your apps’ chances for success right out of the gate. We extend your development team’s resources – providing you with the actionable insight to build better software, and to release quicker and with more confidence.<\/p>","sectionImage":[397820],"sectionCta":"{\"linkedId\":null,\"linkedSiteId\":null,\"linkedTitle\":null,\"linkedUrl\":null,\"payload\":null,\"type\":\"\"}","sectionLayout":"textLeft","sectionCtaColor":"is-secondary","sectionCtaAlignment":"center","hideThisOnMobile":true}},"846752":{"type":"prefabSection","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":1,"fields":{"sectionBackground":"white","sectionBackgroundColors":null,"cssClasses":null,"tabName":null}},"846753":{"type":"prefab_text_w_image","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":2,"fields":{"sectionTitle":"Expertise at Every Step of Your SDLC","sectionSubtitle":null,"paragraphText":"

Applause helps guide your testing process – from test set-up to measuring and reporting on outcomes – to speed up your testing and improve the quality of your digital assets.<\/p>","sectionImage":[809210],"sectionCta":"{\"linkedId\":null,\"linkedSiteId\":null,\"linkedTitle\":null,\"linkedUrl\":null,\"payload\":null,\"type\":\"\"}","sectionLayout":"textTop","sectionCtaColor":"is-secondary","sectionCtaAlignment":"center","hideThisOnMobile":false}}}

node.title: Partnerships
node.responsivehero:
{"701333":{"type":86,"fields":{"heroTitle":"How We Can Partner to Deliver Digital Quality","heroText":"

Partners turn to us to bring authentic, real-world feedback, unparalleled coverage and quality – at scale – that can’t be beat. Join us.<\/p>","heroImage":[397959],"heroBackgroundColor":"#ffffff","heroOverlayAlpha":0,"heroOverlayColor":null}}}
node.pagesectionblocksnew:
{"701334":{"type":"prefabSection","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":1,"fields":{"sectionBackground":null,"sectionBackgroundColors":null,"cssClasses":null,"tabName":null}},"701335":{"type":"prefab_text_w_image","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":2,"fields":{"sectionTitle":"Offshore Testing Isn’t Enough","sectionSubtitle":"Ensuring the quality of a digital experience across every dimension is impossible in the lab. Add global, in-market testing to your portfolio.","paragraphText":"

Traditional offshore and outsourced service providers partner with Applause to ensure the quality of customer-facing applications. The depth and breadth of our independent uTest community’s experience, coupled with our enterprise-class platform, enables partners to leverage the scale, speed and flexibility Applause offers. Our partners turn to us to help them address the increasingly complex use cases their customers have. Applause’s Community model also offers our partners the ability to more readily scale their testing needs for both backend application testing and behind-the-firewall validation services. Applause offers our partners a new, innovative approach.<\/p>","sectionImage":[397974],"sectionCta":"{\"linkedId\":null,\"linkedSiteId\":null,\"linkedTitle\":null,\"linkedUrl\":null,\"payload\":null,\"type\":\"entry\"}","sectionLayout":"textLeft","sectionCtaColor":"is-primary","sectionCtaAlignment":null,"hideThisOnMobile":true}},"701336":{"type":"prefabSection","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":1,"fields":{"sectionBackground":null,"sectionBackgroundColors":null,"cssClasses":null,"tabName":null}},"701337":{"type":"prefab_text_w_image","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":2,"fields":{"sectionTitle":"Testing at Scale in a Dynamic World","sectionSubtitle":"With the need to accelerate the pace of development, there is an increasing need for speed, scale and flexibility. Our independent uTest Community approach offers just that.","paragraphText":"

Development teams are being asked to deliver new releases at unprecedented speeds. At the same time, the expectations around quality have never been greater – and the cost of getting it wrong is increasingly more costly. Unlike traditional testing companies and models (including lab-based and offshoring), Applause responds with the speed, scale and flexibility that digital-focused brands require and expect, and provides actionable insight that can directly inform go\/no go release decisions, helping development teams build better software and release it with confidence.<\/p>\n

We serve as an extension of our partner’s testing teams, integrating seamlessly into existing systems and processes. We extend our partner’s capacity and reach – leveraging our global Community of independent digital experts to not only provide feedback on an application’s functionality, but to offer authentic, aggregated, real-user feedback from the perspective and vantage point of a brand’s targeted user. We do this in every possible condition, including country, local language and device configuration, as well as through the lens of a slew of demographic and psychographic data points. No other company can provide such a rich trove of mission-critical insight and learning at the speed which we deliver results.<\/p>","sectionImage":[398006],"sectionCta":"{\"linkedId\":null,\"linkedSiteId\":null,\"linkedTitle\":null,\"linkedUrl\":null,\"payload\":null,\"type\":\"entry\"}","sectionLayout":"textRight","sectionCtaColor":"is-primary","sectionCtaAlignment":null,"hideThisOnMobile":true}}}

node.title: Industry Expertise
node.responsivehero:
{"701564":{"type":86,"fields":{"heroTitle":"Industry Expertise","heroText":"

Tap into our vast, and deeply knowledgeable and independent global experts, across a wide range of vertical industries and customer solutions.<\/p>","heroImage":[396642],"heroBackgroundColor":"#ffffff","heroOverlayAlpha":0,"heroOverlayColor":null}}}
node.pagesectionblocksnew:
{"719112":{"type":"prefabSection","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":1,"fields":{"sectionBackground":null,"sectionBackgroundColors":null,"cssClasses":null,"tabName":null}},"719113":{"type":"prefab_text_w_image","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":2,"fields":{"sectionTitle":"Design for What Really Matters to Your Customers","sectionSubtitle":"Dedicated experts to ensure you are testing right the first time, every time.","paragraphText":"

Applause has deep domain knowledge and expertise in the industries you care about – including retail, media and entertainment, financial services, travel and hospitality, healthcare, and IoT, among others. We also have extensive experience in the specific customer use cases that are critical to getting testing right the first time, every time.<\/p>\n

For example, within three key segments of IoT – smart home, connected car and wearables – we ensure exceptional performance of use cases such as smart home device provisioning, education and onboarding of in-car infotainment systems, and the accuracy of health data collected by wearables.<\/p>\n

We engage specialized teams based on industry, use case and testing needs, to ensure the fastest start possible and greatest return on your investment. These skilled teams can also be specially trained on your systems, processes and technology to ensure alignment across all your testing activities. Through our enterprise-class testing platform, these independent digital expert teams are assembled via an AI\/ML-driven tester engagement process so you will always have the right team for your specific business requirements.<\/p>","sectionImage":[396657],"sectionCta":"{\"linkedId\":null,\"linkedSiteId\":null,\"linkedTitle\":null,\"linkedUrl\":null,\"payload\":null,\"type\":\"\"}","sectionLayout":"textLeft","sectionCtaColor":"is-primary","sectionCtaAlignment":"center","hideThisOnMobile":false}},"719114":{"type":"prefabSection","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":1,"fields":{"sectionBackground":null,"sectionBackgroundColors":null,"cssClasses":null,"tabName":null}},"719115":{"type":"prefab_list_w_icons","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":2,"fields":{"sectionTitle":"Build better, faster with industry experts","sectionSubtitle":null,"paragraphText":"

node.title: Our Solutions
node.responsivehero:
{"700896":{"type":86,"fields":{"heroTitle":"Our Solutions","heroText":"

Applause provides a wide range of digital quality solutions – from functional testing to specialized engagements.<\/p>","heroImage":[392686],"heroBackgroundColor":"#ffffff","heroOverlayAlpha":0,"heroOverlayColor":null}}}
node.pagesectionblocksnew:
{"719843":{"type":"customSection","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":1,"fields":{"sectionLayout":"textTop","sectionBackground":"auto","sectionBackgroundColors":null,"cssClasses":null,"tabName":null}},"719844":{"type":"headings","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":2,"fields":{"sectionTitle":"Quality encompasses many things. Test for all of them.","sectionSubtitle":"Make sure every digital interaction works as intended, every time."}},"719845":{"type":"paragraphText","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":2,"fields":{"paragraphText":"

Applause helps brands like you capture and keep more customers, by focusing on digital interactions – your front door today and most important touchpoint – as the vast majority of customers will decide to stay or leave based on only one less-than-ideal digital experience. We can test and assess the quality of digital assets and experiences from the perspective and vantage point of your target customers – in every possible condition, including country, local language and device configuration, as well as through the lens of a slew of demographic and psychographic data points. No other company can provide such a rich trove of mission-critical insight and learning, to ensure that your digital assets are performing to expectations and your customers are having the intended digital experiences.

We enable the testing and digital quality process with the Applause Platform, which was built from the start with the speed, scale, security and enterprise-class performance and interoperability you expect. Our platform also drives the community processes of tester engagement and payments, and is the foundation on which we deliver a slew of solutions and features that you can deploy as needed. From functional to specialized testing solutions, from full stack automation testing to test case management features, it’s all there.

"}},"719846":{"type":"prefabSection","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":1,"fields":{"sectionBackground":null,"sectionBackgroundColors":null,"cssClasses":null,"tabName":null}},"719847":{"type":"prefab_text_w_image","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":2,"fields":{"sectionTitle":"Functional Testing","sectionSubtitle":"Manual and Automated Testing for Complete Coverage","paragraphText":"

“Does this work for me?” That’s the first question your customers will ask, and rightly so. Even a perfect UI design means nothing if your users don’t have the digital experience they expect and you intend.

Launching a digital experience that works every time requires stringent testing to ensure that critical bugs do not reach your customers. That’s why Applause offers a full suite of functional testing services that not only reduce issues in your software, but also help you move faster to meet deadlines and release digital experiences on time and on target, with higher quality.

Our functional testing services include both manual structured – to ensure your customers can use the digital asset as intended – and exploratory testing – to find and fix critical errors when users behave in ways you can’t anticipate. And this is all done on real devices, in real locations and scenarios, by real users.

A balanced testing strategy is critical for every company – automation won’t work for every situation, including those with complex user flows. Likewise, manual testing can be too resource-intensive for simple regressions and less-complex use cases. That’s why we offer Integrated Functional Testing – a solution that no one else in the market delivers, which combines both manual and automated testing into one cohesive solution to ensure that your release decisions are faster, more accurate and made with greater confidence.

Solutions","sectionSubtitle":"Ensure a Seamless Digital Experience Across All Customer Touchpoints and Interactions","paragraphText":"

Technology and digital assets are ingrained in all aspects of everyday life – from ordering food and hailing a ride, to checking bank statements and even visiting the doctor. Modern consumers are discerning; they know what a truly great digital experience looks like and expect assets to be enjoyable, accessible and easy to use as a result. This is true regardless of the platform the experience takes place on – it must be flawless, intuitive and relevant across Web, mobile, Voice app, payment type and in-car experience, as well as across all omnichannel customer journeys like BOPIS (Buy Online, Pickup in Store) and curbside pickup.

Like your customers, we know that true digital quality does not stop at functional testing. That’s why we offer a comprehensive suite of end-to-end specialized solutions for your entire software development lifecycle.

Our specialized solutions for User Experience, Accessibility, Customer Journeys, Voice, Payments, and AI Training and Testing ensure that your digital assets are intuitive, user friendly, inclusive and exceptional from start to finish so that you gain and retain customers and maintain a positive brand image.

Features","sectionSubtitle":"Features of the Applause Platform for Even More Specialized Testing","paragraphText":"

With the pace of change moving faster than ever, the quality of digital experiences and the speed at which they can be delivered is paramount. The sooner you release, the faster you flank your competitors and keep your customers happy. Specialized features of the Applause Platform can help you launch these high-quality experiences with even greater velocity and confidence.

Our Bring Your Own Testers (BYOT) feature lets you manage your own internal testing resources – friends, family, end users, etc. – all within the Applause testing platform.

We will also soon be launching a new feature for test case management, so you can manage and execute test cases entirely through Applause's proven testing platform.

node.title: About Vista Equity Partners
node.responsivehero:
{"730961":{"type":86,"fields":{"heroTitle":"Applause’s Partnership with Vista Equity Partners","heroText":"

Applause was acquired by Vista Equity Partners in August 2017, which has since furthered the digital quality company’s growth and development.<\/p>","heroImage":[387249],"heroBackgroundColor":"#ffffff","heroOverlayAlpha":0,"heroOverlayColor":null}}}
node.pagesectionblocksnew:
{"602145":{"type":"prefabSection","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":1,"fields":{"sectionBackground":"auto","sectionBackgroundColors":null,"cssClasses":null,"tabName":null}},"602146":{"type":"prefab_text_w_image","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":2,"fields":{"sectionTitle":"Applause & Vista","sectionSubtitle":null,"paragraphText":"

In August 2017, Applause announced that it would be acquired by global market-leading investment firm Vista Equity Partners. Part of Vista’s global portfolio of companies, Applause has been able to reach its goals of expanding its leadership within the digital testing industry, offering exceptional user insights and pioneering testing technology within its platform. The Framingham, Massachusetts-based company had considered an IPO before Vista’s investment, and has worked with investors Goldman Sachs, QuestMark Partners and Scale Venture Partners, among others. In 2016, Accenture and Credit Suisse had also invested in the software firm.

Doron Reuveni, Applause Executive Chairman and Co-Founder, had said of the acquisition, “This is a tremendous milestone for Applause, one which validates our mission: to deliver flawless digital experiences to the world. Our human-centric approach to software design and quality has become essential to ensure technology works as intended, by real people, in the real world. As we take Applause to our next stage of growth, we are delighted to partner with Vista’s second-to-none talent and expertise.”

Since Vista’s acquisition of Applause, the company has been able to expand its capabilities to test mission critical websites and apps in real-time. During the onset of COVID-19, Israel’s Ministry of Health used Applause software and their community of test users to troubleshoot the Ministry of Health’s infection tracking app. This app used GPS data from users’ cell phones to quickly and effectively identify potential infection zones and to notify users if they had been in the vicinity of anyone who was later diagnosed with COVID-19.

Applause has been able to help aid American healthcare providers during the outbreak, as well. As many practices switched to telehealth appointments during the lockdown, many used Applause to remotely test their online portals and COVID-specific chatbots, which allowed for safe and effective web and application testing without the need for in-person contact.

","sectionImage":[447542],"sectionCta":"{"linkedId":null,"linkedSiteId":null,"linkedTitle":null,"linkedUrl":null,"payload":null,"type":""}","sectionLayout":"textLeft","sectionCtaColor":"is-secondary","sectionCtaAlignment":"center","hideThisOnMobile":false}},"602147":{"type":"prefabSection","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":1,"fields":{"sectionBackground":"auto","sectionBackgroundColors":null,"cssClasses":null,"tabName":null}},"602148":{"type":"prefab_text_w_image","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":2,"fields":{"sectionTitle":"About Vista Equity Partners","sectionSubtitle":null,"paragraphText":"

Vista Equity Partners is an investment firm that was founded in 2000. The company operates out of offices in Austin, Chicago, New York, Oakland and San Francisco. Vista invests exclusively in enterprise software, data and technology-enabled companies, aiming to help them achieve growth at scale through its investment platform and global technology ecosystem. Vista’s strategies include private equity, permanent capital, public equity and credit. Dedicated to yielding consistent returns for all stakeholders, Vista’s differentiated approach to enterprise software investment prioritizes value creation through operational transformation.

The firm has also made a commitment to enacting positive changes in their local communities as well as on a global scale. In partnership with Vista’s corporate partners and over 50 nonprofit and community groups, the firm supports advocacy of STEM education, financial literacy and accessibility for women in the workforce. These long-term partnerships aim to create opportunities for marginalized individuals and communities, and to foster a love of learning.

For more information on how Vista companies are driving transformative change across industries, connect with Vista Equity Partners on YouTube.

Read more about the people behind Applause’s ability to provide exceptional digital products, at the speed of life.

node.title: Our Testing Community
node.responsivehero:
{"701396":{"type":86,"fields":{"heroTitle":"Our Testing Community","heroText":"

uTest is the world’s largest, most diverse community of independent digital experts — available to validate and provide insight on your most challenging and unique test scenarios, 24\/7\/365.<\/p>","heroImage":[399119],"heroBackgroundColor":"#ffffff","heroOverlayAlpha":0,"heroOverlayColor":null}}}
node.pagesectionblocksnew:
{"723019":{"type":"prefabSection","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":1,"fields":{"sectionBackground":"auto","sectionBackgroundColors":null,"cssClasses":null,"tabName":null}},"723020":{"type":"prefab_text_w_image","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":2,"fields":{"sectionTitle":"Get to Know Your Customers Like Never Before","sectionSubtitle":"Test your products with real people in the real world.","paragraphText":"

uTest is the world’s largest community of independent digital experts. Spanning 200 countries and territories, and every device/OS combination imaginable, skilled testers deliver authentic feedback and insights into how your apps and software work in real-world conditions. Our digital experts experience your products as your customers would – on real devices, in real locations, in real situations – in order to provide you with the most valuable and actionable aggregated results.

From automation engineers to user experience researchers and accessibility experts, uTest delivers the expertise you need to meet your specific testing needs. Unlike other testing methods, our community is available on demand – 24 hours a day, seven days a week, 365 days a year.

","sectionImage":[945149],"sectionCta":"{"linkedId":null,"linkedSiteId":null,"linkedTitle":null,"linkedUrl":null,"payload":null,"type":""}","sectionLayout":"textTop","sectionCtaColor":"is-primary","sectionCtaAlignment":"center","hideThisOnMobile":true}},"723021":{"type":"prefabSection","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":1,"fields":{"sectionBackground":"auto","sectionBackgroundColors":null,"cssClasses":null,"tabName":null}},"723022":{"type":"prefab_list_w_icons","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":2,"fields":{"sectionTitle":"Even the most hard-to-reach customers are now within reach for testing","sectionSubtitle":null,"paragraphText":"

Our ever-growing independent uTest community spans every country, language and device on demand.

","sectionList_icon":{"723023":{"type":93,"fields":{"heading":"Full Device/OS Coverage","icon":[399123],"blurb":"From Android to iOS, Samsung to Sony, Smart TVs to Smart Thermostats…our community can put your product through its paces.","linkThisBlock":false,"listLink":"{"linkedId":null,"linkedSiteId":null,"linkedTitle":null,"linkedUrl":null,"payload":null,"type":"entry"}","overrideSize":[{"col1":"65px","col2":"auto"}]}},"723024":{"type":93,"fields":{"heading":"Any Setting, Any Country","icon":[399125],"blurb":"In-store, curbside, at home or riding the subway, our community provides in-context feedback and results, and includes independent testers in more than 200 countries and territories.","linkThisBlock":false,"listLink":"{"linkedId":null,"linkedSiteId":null,"linkedTitle":null,"linkedUrl":null,"payload":null,"type":"entry"}","overrideSize":[{"col1":"65px","col2":"auto"}]}},"723025":{"type":93,"fields":{"heading":"As Diverse as Real Customers","icon":[399127],"blurb":"Our community is diverse because your target audience is diverse. That’s why we engage testers based on location, device, payment instrument, and other demographic and psychographic criteria.","linkThisBlock":false,"listLink":"{"linkedId":null,"linkedSiteId":null,"linkedTitle":null,"linkedUrl":null,"payload":null,"type":"entry"}","overrideSize":[{"col1":"65px","col2":"auto"}]}},"723026":{"type":93,"fields":{"heading":"Fast, 24/7 Results & Feedback","icon":[399129],"blurb":"Stand up testing teams rapidly. Run projects in real time, at any hour, any time of the day, worldwide. Get results and feedback in hours, not weeks or months.","linkThisBlock":false,"listLink":"{"linkedId":null,"linkedSiteId":null,"linkedTitle":null,"linkedUrl":null,"payload":null,"type":"entry"}","overrideSize":[{"col1":"65px","col2":"auto"}]}},"723027":{"type":93,"fields":{"heading":"In the Language of Your Customers","icon":[399131],"blurb":"Our community speaks the languages of your customers in order to accurately represent your target audiences and match their feedback and preferences.","linkThisBlock":false,"listLink":"{"linkedId":null,"linkedSiteId":null,"linkedTitle":null,"linkedUrl":null,"payload":null,"type":"entry"}","overrideSize":[{"col1":"65px","col2":"auto"}]}}},"sectionCta":"{"linkedId":null,"linkedSiteId":null,"linkedTitle":null,"linkedUrl":null,"payload":null,"type":""}","sectionLayout":"textTop","sectionCtaColor":"is-primary","sectionCtaAlignment":"center","listColumns":"3","listLayout":"iconTop","assetDimensions":[{"col1":"50","col2":"50","col3":"px"}],"hideThisOnMobile":false}},"723028":{"type":"prefabSection","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":1,"fields":{"sectionBackground":"auto","sectionBackgroundColors":null,"cssClasses":null,"tabName":null}},"723029":{"type":"prefab_text_w_image","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":2,"fields":{"sectionTitle":"A Community Built on Trust and Security","sectionSubtitle":"Protecting your business as if it were ours","paragraphText":"

We take the professionalism of our independent uTest Community very seriously. Testers can opt to build skills through our Academy Program, which features increasingly demanding coursework, as well as through Centers of Excellence offering optional training in highly specialized areas such as accessibility, automation and payments testing.

uTest members voluntarily sign non-disclosure agreements, signaling their commitment to maintaining the privacy of a brand’s digital properties and businesses. For ultra-sensitive projects, brands can also choose to work with our highest-level VIP testers, who each have multi-year track records of testing with us.

When brands work with uTest, they can rest assured that we are protecting their best interests.

","sectionImage":[399175],"sectionCta":"{"linkedId":null,"linkedSiteId":null,"linkedTitle":null,"linkedUrl":null,"payload":null,"type":""}","sectionLayout":"textLeft","sectionCtaColor":"is-primary","sectionCtaAlignment":"center","hideThisOnMobile":true}},"723030":{"type":"prefabSection","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":1,"fields":{"sectionBackground":"auto","sectionBackgroundColors":null,"cssClasses":null,"tabName":null}},"723031":{"type":"prefab_text_w_image","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":2,"fields":{"sectionTitle":"Leave the Heavy Lifting to Us","sectionSubtitle":"Applause handles all aspects of independent tester engagement and project management for ultimate peace of mind","paragraphText":"

We shoulder the end-to-end testing management process so you don’t have to. Our client-facing and community-facing teams work directly with you to support your needs – from the initial onboarding process and test cycle kickoffs, through to collecting and triaging the aggregated test results, analyzing them and validating that issues are fixed. Throughout the whole process, we work directly with you to speed up release velocity and improve product quality.

With Applause, you always know that you have the right testing team for your project. That’s because we take an AI/ML-driven approach to tester engagement. Our AI/ML capabilities identify the best testing team for your project based on your requirements and our testers’ personal profiles. This process ensures that your testers match your ideal target audience demographics – in terms of age, location, language, device/OS and more.

Our community management work doesn’t stop after your team is identified – we handle all invites and incentives, onboarding, kickoff and triaging processes, as well as tester payments. Our community-facing team ensures you get the most from uTest by staying in constant communication with your specific teams, so that your testing results are delivered right away – quickly and efficiently. We take full responsibility of all community and test cycle management so that you can focus on what’s most important to your business – releasing bug-free and intuitive digital experiences that your end users will love.

","sectionImage":[399177],"sectionCta":"{"linkedId":null,"linkedSiteId":null,"linkedTitle":null,"linkedUrl":null,"payload":null,"type":""}","sectionLayout":"textRight","sectionCtaColor":"is-primary","sectionCtaAlignment":"center","hideThisOnMobile":true}}}

node.title: Working with Applause
node.responsivehero:
{"677777":{"type":86,"fields":{"heroTitle":"Working with Applause","heroText":"

By handling all aspects of test management and community interaction, Applause delivers maximum value to your team while adding virtually no overhead. With our comprehensive and fully managed approach, we integrate completely into your existing resources, processes and technologies, becoming an extension of your internal team.<\/p>","heroImage":[399037],"heroBackgroundColor":"#ffffff","heroOverlayAlpha":0,"heroOverlayColor":null}}}
node.pagesectionblocksnew:
{"723378":{"type":"prefabSection","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":1,"fields":{"sectionBackground":null,"sectionBackgroundColors":null,"cssClasses":null,"tabName":null}},"723379":{"type":"prefab_text_w_image","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":2,"fields":{"sectionTitle":"Enterprise-Class Execution","sectionSubtitle":"We Steward Brands Through the Entire Testing Process","paragraphText":"

Applause executes with the speed, scale and flexibility that innovative, digital-focused brands like you expect and require. We are purpose-built to respond quickly and to stand up detailed testing programs that deliver impactful results even faster.

Through our fully managed service, we steward you through the entire process. We’ll match you with a curated testing team, led by a digital expert who is fluent in testing best practices and knows how to bring the power of our disruptive community testing approach to bear for your project – leading engagements that deliver authentic, valuable and actionable results.

We also calibrate the engagement to meet your specific objectives. We quickly learn what you are trying to accomplish – and what your customers care about – and then structure, manage and deliver the engagement in the context of those goals. Results will be delivered in both your internal language, as well as in the language of your customers – ensuring that feedback is easy to digest and understand, and immediately actionable.

","sectionImage":[808111],"sectionCta":"{"linkedId":null,"linkedSiteId":null,"linkedTitle":null,"linkedUrl":null,"payload":null,"type":""}","sectionLayout":"textLeft","sectionCtaColor":"is-secondary","sectionCtaAlignment":"center","hideThisOnMobile":true}},"723380":{"type":"prefabSection","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":1,"fields":{"sectionBackground":null,"sectionBackgroundColors":null,"cssClasses":null,"tabName":null}},"723381":{"type":"prefab_text_w_image","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":2,"fields":{"sectionTitle":"Interoperability, With No Overhead","sectionSubtitle":"Seamless Integration with Your Systems and Processes","paragraphText":"

We execute in a way that makes no demands of a brand. You neither have to rework your existing development processes, nor introduce overhead to take advantage of our solutions. Applause’s fully managed approach dovetails seamlessly with your existing systems and processes and handles every detail, and the Applause platform integrates with all standard software within your SDLC – powering the automated delivery of testing results, quickly and directly into these systems.

We have the domain knowledge, experience and resources to execute effectively on literally any remit – from massive worldwide digital utterance collections with scale volume, to sensitive pre-release device testing with complexity and nuance, to accessibility audits that assess and ensure compliance. Simply put, if you can build it, we can put it through its paces – at a rigorous pace.

","sectionImage":[447651],"sectionCta":"{"linkedId":null,"linkedSiteId":null,"linkedTitle":null,"linkedUrl":null,"payload":null,"type":""}","sectionLayout":"textRight","sectionCtaColor":"is-secondary","sectionCtaAlignment":"center","hideThisOnMobile":true}},"723382":{"type":"prefabSection","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":1,"fields":{"sectionBackground":null,"sectionBackgroundColors":null,"cssClasses":null,"tabName":null}},"723383":{"type":"prefab_text_w_image","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":2,"fields":{"sectionTitle":"Manage Testing Your Way","sectionSubtitle":"The Flexibility To Leverage Applause How You See Fit","paragraphText":"

While we offer fully managed services, we can also take a hands-off approach, if you prefer to manage the entire process or aspects of it by yourself. We provide the necessary tools, chat features and full access to our community and SaaS infrastructure to set you up for success.

Our SaaS infrastructure and management tools are all user friendly, such that you can easily manage any aspect of your relationship with Applause as you see fit. And our internal experts and Solution Delivery Managers are always available to provide any help you need along the way.

You can also take advantage of our Bring Your Own Testers (BYOT) feature. With BYOT, you can leverage your own internal testing resources – including employees, existing customers, friends and family – and manage all testing and results within our enterprise-grade technology platform.

","sectionImage":[447665],"sectionCta":"{"linkedId":null,"linkedSiteId":null,"linkedTitle":null,"linkedUrl":null,"payload":null,"type":""}","sectionLayout":"textLeft","sectionCtaColor":"is-secondary","sectionCtaAlignment":"center","hideThisOnMobile":true}}}

node.responsivehero:
{"604818":{"type":86,"fields":{"heroTitle":null,"heroText":"

Our industry-leading SaaS platform make it easy to kick off tests, interact with the community, and receive actionable insights in real time.<\/p>","heroImage":[5003],"heroBackgroundColor":"#ffffff","heroOverlayAlpha":0,"heroOverlayColor":null}}}

{"604819":{"type":"prefabSection","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":1,"fields":{"sectionBackground":null,"sectionBackgroundColors":null,"cssClasses":null,"tabName":null}},"604820":{"type":"prefab_text_w_image","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":2,"fields":{"sectionTitle":"Easily Launch Tests","sectionSubtitle":"Maximize your team’s efficiency and agility.","paragraphText":"

Our goal is for your team to be as efficient as possible, spending less time setting up tests and digging through data so you can spend more time executing fixes. Our platform provides a seamless interface making it simple to launch a test. Just point to your build, define your test scope, and choose tester requirements like devices, locations, or languages directly from the interface. To save even more time, send a Slack message or email to your Solution Delivery Manager and they’ll do it for you!<\/p>","sectionImage":[4258],"sectionCta":"{\"linkedId\":null,\"linkedSiteId\":null,\"linkedTitle\":null,\"linkedUrl\":null,\"payload\":null,\"type\":\"entry\"}","sectionLayout":"textLeft","sectionCtaColor":"is-primary","sectionCtaAlignment":"center","hideThisOnMobile":true}},"604821":{"type":"prefabSection","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":1,"fields":{"sectionBackground":null,"sectionBackgroundColors":null,"cssClasses":null,"tabName":null}},"604822":{"type":"prefab_text_w_image","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":2,"fields":{"sectionTitle":"See Issues in Real Time","sectionSubtitle":"Everything you need to make the right decisions, fast.","paragraphText":"

Speed is the name of the game. The faster you receive issues and feedback, the faster you can take corrective action. With Applause, testing results generally start to come back within minutes and bug reports are available instantaneously—complete with reproduction steps, device logs, and screen recordings.<\/p>","sectionImage":[5454],"sectionCta":"{\"linkedId\":null,\"linkedSiteId\":null,\"linkedTitle\":null,\"linkedUrl\":null,\"payload\":null,\"type\":\"entry\"}","sectionLayout":"textRight","sectionCtaColor":"is-primary","sectionCtaAlignment":"center","hideThisOnMobile":true}},"604823":{"type":"prefabSection","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":1,"fields":{"sectionBackground":null,"sectionBackgroundColors":null,"cssClasses":null,"tabName":null}},"604824":{"type":"prefab_text_w_image","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":2,"fields":{"sectionTitle":"View Analytics and Reporting","sectionSubtitle":"Complete visibility for making informed decisions.","paragraphText":"

node.title: Crowdtesting
node.responsivehero:
{"669973":{"type":86,"fields":{"heroTitle":"Crowdtesting","heroText":"

Applause invented the crowdtesting category in 2007, and we have been the driving force in testing and digital quality innovation ever since. We've helped thousands of brands deliver quality digital assets and experiences to their customers on a global scale.<\/p>","heroImage":[5001],"heroBackgroundColor":"#ffffff","heroOverlayAlpha":0,"heroOverlayColor":null}}}
node.pagesectionblocksnew:
{"898514":{"type":"prefabSection","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":1,"fields":{"sectionBackground":"auto","sectionBackgroundColors":null,"cssClasses":null,"tabName":null}},"898515":{"type":"prefab_text_w_video","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":2,"fields":{"sectionTitle":"What Is Crowdtesting?","sectionSubtitle":"Deliver Quality Digital Assets & Experiences, With the Speed, Scale and Flexibility of Crowdtesting","paragraphText":"

Crowdtesting, or crowdsourced testing, is the fastest and most flexible way to ensure you release high-quality software quickly and with confidence. Crowdtesting leverages skilled testing teams sourced from a globally dispersed community of independent digital experts, who are highly skilled and ready to stand up testing at a moment’s notice, in any language, on any device and operating system.

These testers serve as proxies for your own customers – delivering detailed, aggregated and authentic real-world feedback on the quality, user experience and functionality of your digital assets. They live, work and play in the industries and real-world scenarios that you need to test in to ensure that you deliver delightful digital experiences to your end users, the first time and every time.

","sectionVideo":{"898516":{"type":96,"fields":{"videoId":"64mliz9omo","videoPreview":[898145]}}},"sectionCta":"{"linkedId":null,"linkedSiteId":null,"linkedTitle":null,"linkedUrl":null,"payload":null,"type":""}","sectionLayout":"textLeft","sectionCtaColor":"is-secondary","sectionCtaAlignment":"left","hideThisOnMobile":false}},"898517":{"type":"prefabSection","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":1,"fields":{"sectionBackground":"auto","sectionBackgroundColors":null,"cssClasses":null,"tabName":null}},"898518":{"type":"prefab_list_w_icons","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":2,"fields":{"sectionTitle":"Why Crowdtesting?","sectionSubtitle":null,"paragraphText":"

Crowdtesting allows you to quickly scale to support new product launches or expansion into new geographic regions, without having to hire additional staff. See how crowdtesting can help your team improve quality and speed release velocity.

","sectionList_icon":{"898519":{"type":93,"fields":{"heading":"Faster Innovation with Fewer Bugs","icon":[145852],"blurb":"Through rapid testing and feedback, QA teams can better keep up with an increasing pace of development, while improving quality – helping you get to market faster with higher-quality digital assets.","linkThisBlock":false,"listLink":"{"linkedId":null,"linkedSiteId":null,"linkedTitle":null,"linkedUrl":null,"payload":null,"type":""}","overrideSize":[{"col1":"65px","col2":"auto"}]}},"898520":{"type":93,"fields":{"heading":"Improved Customer Experience","icon":[557798],"blurb":"Authentic feedback from real users in real-world settings helps you improve app performance and deliver better customer experiences – increasing conversion rates and driving retention.","linkThisBlock":false,"listLink":"{"linkedId":null,"linkedSiteId":null,"linkedTitle":null,"linkedUrl":null,"payload":null,"type":""}","overrideSize":[{"col1":"65px","col2":"auto"}]}},"898521":{"type":93,"fields":{"heading":"Reduced Testing Efforts & Cost","icon":[399129],"blurb":"Remote, distributed teams help you scale test coverage without the burden of additional overhead costs.","linkThisBlock":false,"listLink":"{"linkedId":null,"linkedSiteId":null,"linkedTitle":null,"linkedUrl":null,"payload":null,"type":""}","overrideSize":[{"col1":"65px","col2":"auto"}]}}},"sectionCta":"{"linkedId":null,"linkedSiteId":null,"linkedTitle":null,"linkedUrl":null,"payload":null,"type":""}","sectionLayout":"textTop","sectionCtaColor":"is-primary","sectionCtaAlignment":"center","listColumns":"3","listLayout":"iconTop","assetDimensions":[{"col1":"50","col2":"50","col3":"px"}],"hideThisOnMobile":false}},"898522":{"type":"prefabSection","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":1,"fields":{"sectionBackground":"auto","sectionBackgroundColors":null,"cssClasses":null,"tabName":null}},"898523":{"type":"prefab_text_w_image","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":2,"fields":{"sectionTitle":"Our Approach To Crowdtesting","sectionSubtitle":"Deliver Exceptional Digital Assets Quickly With the Scalability and Flexibility of Crowdtesting","paragraphText":"

We engage crowdsourced testing teams matched to your exact needs in terms of demographic, location, industry, language, device/OS combination and testing expertise. This allows you to replicate real-world scenarios and test with digital experts that match your target customers. Crowdsourced testers are skilled in the full suite of testing solutions – from manual exploratory testing to accessibility and payments testing. You’ll have a primary point of contact to manage your testing projects and a dedicated team working for you behind the scenes to deliver triaged test results directly into your bug tracking system, fitting easily into your existing workflows.

The distributed, remote and on-demand nature of crowdtesting gives you unparalleled scalability and time-to-results when compared to traditional testing methods. It also delivers unmatched and nearly limitless coverage across testing scenarios. Since testers are available on demand and around the globe, you can scale testing up or down to meet the needs of your internal teams and end users. That’s why Applause is a testing best practice for digital innovators, and an integral part of every modern SDLC.

","sectionImage":[145832],"sectionCta":"{"linkedId":null,"linkedSiteId":null,"linkedTitle":null,"linkedUrl":null,"payload":null,"type":""}","sectionLayout":"textRight","sectionCtaColor":"is-primary","sectionCtaAlignment":"center","hideThisOnMobile":false}},"898524":{"type":"prefabSection","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":1,"fields":{"sectionBackground":"auto","sectionBackgroundColors":null,"cssClasses":null,"tabName":null}},"898525":{"type":"prefab_text_w_image","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":2,"fields":{"sectionTitle":"Crowdtesting ROI","sectionSubtitle":null,"paragraphText":"

Only Applause executes with the speed, scale and flexibility you require and expect – rapidly standing up detailed testing programs that deliver authentic, impactful, actionable results. That’s why we’re a testing best practice for digital innovators across the globe, and an integral part of modern SDLCs in every industry.

","sectionImage":[808642],"sectionCta":"{"linkedId":null,"linkedSiteId":null,"linkedTitle":null,"linkedUrl":null,"payload":null,"type":""}","sectionLayout":"textTop","sectionCtaColor":"is-primary","sectionCtaAlignment":"center","hideThisOnMobile":false}},"898526":{"type":"prefabSection","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":1,"fields":{"sectionBackground":"auto","sectionBackgroundColors":null,"cssClasses":null,"tabName":null}},"898527":{"type":"prefab_text_w_image","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":2,"fields":{"sectionTitle":"Our Testing Community","sectionSubtitle":"Applause handles all aspects of independent tester engagement and project management for ultimate peace of mind","paragraphText":"

We shoulder the end-to-end testing management process so you don’t have to. Our client-facing and community-facing teams work directly with you to support your needs – from the initial onboarding process and test cycle kickoffs, through to collecting and triaging the aggregated test results, analyzing them and validating that issues are fixed. Throughout the whole process, we work directly with you to speed up release velocity and improve product quality.

With Applause, you always know that you have the right testing team for your project. That’s because we take an AI/ML-driven approach to tester engagement. Our AI/ML capabilities identify the best testing team for your project based on your requirements and our testers’ personal profiles. This process ensures that your testers match your ideal target audience demographics – in terms of age, location, language, device/OS and more.

","sectionImage":[399177],"sectionCta":"{"linkedId":null,"linkedSiteId":null,"linkedTitle":null,"linkedUrl":null,"payload":null,"type":""}","sectionLayout":"textLeft","sectionCtaColor":"is-primary","sectionCtaAlignment":"center","hideThisOnMobile":false}},"898528":{"type":"prefabSection","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":1,"fields":{"sectionBackground":"auto","sectionBackgroundColors":null,"cssClasses":null,"tabName":null}},"898529":{"type":"prefab_list_w_icons","enabled":true,"collapsed":false,"level":2,"fields":{"sectionTitle":"Get
